ClearWeb is an ad-blocking Chrome extension from ClearVPN, a hassle-free VPN app.

ClearWeb will make your browsing experience safe, pleasant, and private. Here’s how:
 - Block annoying ads from your browsers. This includes banners, pop-ups, video ads on streaming platforms, and more.
 - Filter online trackers to prevent third parties from accessing your browsing data.
 - Get rid of annoyances and miscellaneous online threats using smart filtering lists.
 - Block annoyances in specific languages and regions.
 - Combined with ClearVPN, ClearWeb provides a complete set of security and browsing assistance tools for any online task.

ClearWeb is free and available without the installation of ClearVPN. Just add it to your Chrome and turn it on – and you’re good to go.

However, to enjoy the extension’s Advanced tools, like complete ad-blocking control and expanded filtering lists, we invite you to get a ClearVPN subscription and get full access to ClearWeb in the package.

Enjoy a safer, nicer web with ClearWeb!
